sentences: You cannot control their behavior, but you can control your reaction.
Setting firm boundaries is your most powerful tool.
It's not your job to fix them.
Protect your energy; limit your interaction with them.
Choose your battles wisely; not every comment needs a response.

links.name: Mark Manson - The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck

dos: Stay calm and objective in your interactions.
Use 'I' statements to express how their behavior affects you.
Document interactions in a professional setting if necessary.
Focus on the issue, not the person.
donts: Don't engage in their drama or get pulled into arguments.
Don't try to reason with someone who is being deliberately unreasonable.
